channel.title: Anxiety on P H A N T I S O C R A C Y.
channel.description: Recent content in Anxiety on P H A N T I S O C R A C Y.

item.title: On Hiking
item.description: The terrible thought that all this hiking will become just a dream that noiselessly and plangently subsides into the realm of “memory” is too much to bear. I must find new roads to walk, new mountains to explore, and new secret hideouts.
